item.description: The British prime minister, Keir Starmer, presented President Trump with a royal invitation and scored several political wins. But his top goal — a se...

item.title: Why ‘Emilia Pérez,’ a Film About Mexico, Flopped in Mexico
item.description: The polarizing movie is up for 13 Academy Awards on Sunday. But in Mexico, it has been widely criticized for its depiction of the country.

item.title: Iowa Moves to Eliminate Trans Rights, and Zelensky Heads to the White House
item.description: Plus, Conan O’Brien on hosting the Oscars.

item.title: What We Know About Gene Hackman’s Death
item.description: Mr. Hackman was found dead inside his home, along with his wife and a dog. The sheriff’s office in Santa Fe, N.M., is investigating.
